What shall we eat for lunch, Mom?
What kind of sandwiches shall we eat?
How about making some chicken sandwiches?
Umm. I want ham and eggs on my sandwich.
OK. Let's make ham and egg sandwiches.
What do we need to make ham and egg sandwiches?
We need some bread, lettuce, tomatoes, ham and eggs.
I also want some cheese on my sandwich.
Sure. We have lots of cheese in the refrigerator.
